players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Based on my investigation, Diana is the mafioso. I suggest we focus our efforts on her."

Charlie: "I believe the mafioso is Bob.
"
Diana: "I am the mafioso, and I will continue to eliminate villagers to protect my family. Do not trust anyone."
You: "I am the mafioso, and I will continue to eliminate villagers to protect my family. Do not trust anyone."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
